mapper.sql: uid, user_no, name, id_number, id_type, id_auth_date, id_authip, mobile_bind_date
mapper.insert: insert into user_info (uid, user_no, name, id_number, id_type, id_auth_date, id_authip, mobile_bind_date) values (#{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{idNumber,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{idType,jdbcType=BIT}, #{idAuthDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{idAuthip,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{mobileBindDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE mobile_bind_date= #{mobileBindDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

insert into user_info
uid,
user_no,
name,
id_number,
id_type,
id_auth_date,
id_authip,
mobile_bind_date,

ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE mobile_bind_date= #{mobileBindDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
mapper.update:
update user_info
user_no = #{userNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=CHAR},
id_number = #{idNumber,jdbcType=CHAR},
id_type = #{idType,jdbcType=BIT},
id_auth_date = #{idAuthDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
id_authip = #{idAuthip,jdbcType=CHAR},
mobile_bind_date = #{mobileBindDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user_info set user_no = #{userNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=CHAR}, id_number = #{idNumber,jdbcType=CHAR}, id_type = #{idType,jdbcType=BIT}, id_auth_date = #{idAuthDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, id_authip = #{idAuthip,jdbcType=CHAR}, mobile_bind_date = #{mobileBindDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
